mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TRIP_PROD t LEFT JOIN TRIP_PROD_SALE s ON t.TRIP_PROD_NO = s.TRIP_PROD_NO WHERE t.PROD_CTGRY_TYPE != 'accommodation' AND (t.DEL_YN = 'N' OR t.DEL_YN IS NULL)
AND ( t.TRIP_PROD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR t.TRIP_PROD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' )
AND t.PROD_CTGRY_TYPE = #{searchType}
AND t.CTY_NM = #{searchRegion}
AND t.APRV_YN = 'Y' AND t.APPROVE_STATUS = '판매중'
AND t.APRV_YN = 'Y' AND t.APPROVE_STATUS = '판매중지'
AND (t.APRV_YN = 'N' OR t.APRV_YN IS NULL)

SELECT t.TRIP_PROD_NO, t.PROD_CTGRY_TYPE, t.APPROVE_STATUS, t.TRIP_PROD_TITLE, t.REG_DT, t.APRV_YN, t.DEL_YN, t.CTY_NM, s.PRICE, s.DISCOUNT, s.CUR_STOCK, CASE WHEN t.APRV_YN = 'Y' AND t.APPROVE_STATUS = '판매중' THEN '판매중' WHEN t.APRV_YN = 'Y' THEN '판매중지' ELSE '승인대기' END AS DISPLAY_STATUS FROM TRIP_PROD t LEFT JOIN TRIP_PROD_SALE s ON t.TRIP_PROD_NO = s.TRIP_PROD_NO WHERE t.PROD_CTGRY_TYPE != 'accommodation' AND (t.DEL_YN = 'N' OR t.DEL_YN IS NULL)
AND ( t.TRIP_PROD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' OR t.TRIP_PROD_CONTENT LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' )
AND t.PROD_CTGRY_TYPE = #{searchType}
AND t.CTY_NM = #{searchRegion}
AND t.APRV_YN = 'Y' AND t.APPROVE_STATUS = '판매중'
AND t.APRV_YN = 'Y' AND t.APPROVE_STATUS = '판매중지'
AND (t.APRV_YN = 'N' OR t.APRV_YN IS NULL)
ORDER BY CASE WHEN t.APRV_YN = 'N' OR t.APRV_YN IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, t.REG_DT DESC

SELECT t.TRIP_PROD_NO, t.COMP_NO, t.MEM_NO, t.PROD_CTGRY_TYPE, t.APPROVE_STATUS, t.TRIP_PROD_TITLE, t.TRIP_PROD_CONTENT, t.SALE_START_DT, t.SALE_END_DT, t.ATTACH_NO, t.VIEW_CNT, t.REG_DT, t.MOD_DT, t.APRV_YN, t.REJ_RSN, t.DEL_YN, t.CTY_NM, s.PRICE, s.NETPRC, s.DISCOUNT, s.LEAD_TIME, s.TOTAL_STOCK, s.CUR_STOCK, i.PROD_RUNTIME, i.PROD_DURATION, i.PROD_MIN_PEOPLE, i.PROD_MAX_PEOPLE, i.PROD_LIM_AGE, i.PROD_INCLUDE, i.PROD_EXCLUDE, i.PROD_NOTICE, p.PROD_PLC_NO, p.ADDR1, p.ADDR2, c.BZMN_NM AS SELLER_NAME, c.COMP_INTRO AS SELLER_INTRO, (SELECT AFD.FILE_PATH FROM ATTACH_FILE_DETAIL AFD WHERE AFD.ATTACH_NO = m.MEM_PROFILE AND AFD.USE_YN = 'Y' AND ROWNUM = 1) AS SELLER_PROFILE_IMAGE FROM TRIP_PROD t LEFT JOIN TRIP_PROD_SALE s ON t.TRIP_PROD_NO = s.TRIP_PROD_NO LEFT JOIN TRIP_PROD_INFO i ON t.TRIP_PROD_NO = i.TRIP_PROD_NO LEFT JOIN TRIP_PROD_PLACE p ON t.TRIP_PROD_NO = p.TRIP_PROD_NO LEFT JOIN COMPANY c ON t.COMP_NO = c.COMP_NO LEFT JOIN MEMBER m ON c.MEM_NO = m.MEM_NO WHERE t.TRIP_PROD_NO = #{tripProdNo}
SELECT TIME_INFO_NO, TRIP_PROD_NO, RSVT_AVAILABLE_TIME FROM PROD_TIME_INFO WHERE TRIP_PROD_NO = #{tripProdNo} ORDER BY RSVT_AVAILABLE_TIME

SELECT FILE_NO, ATTACH_NO, FILE_NAME, FILE_ORIGINAL_NAME, FILE_EXT, FILE_SIZE, FILE_PATH, FILE_GB_CD, MIMY_TYPE, USE_YN FROM ATTACH_FILE_DETAIL WHERE ATTACH_NO = #{attachNo} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY FILE_NO
mapper.update: UPDATE TRIP_PROD SET APRV_YN = 'Y', APPROVE_STATUS = '판매중', RES_DT = SYSDATE, MOD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE TRIP_PROD_NO = #{tripProdNo}
UPDATE TRIP_PROD SET APPROVE_STATUS = #{approveStatus}, MOD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE TRIP_PROD_NO = #{tripProdNo}
UPDATE TRIP_PROD SET DEL_YN = 'Y', APPROVE_STATUS = '판매중지', DEL_DT = SYSDATE, MOD_DT = SYSDATE WHERE TRIP_PROD_NO = #{tripProdNo}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS totalCount, SUM(CASE WHEN APRV_YN = 'Y' AND APPROVE_STATUS = '판매중' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS activeCount, SUM(CASE WHEN APRV_YN = 'Y' AND APPROVE_STATUS != '판매중' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS inactiveCount, SUM(CASE WHEN APRV_YN != 'Y' OR APRV_YN IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS pendingCount FROM TRIP_PROD WHERE PROD_CTGRY_TYPE != 'accommodation' AND (DEL_YN = 'N' OR DEL_YN IS NULL)
